Observed at: Bow Valley 7:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -12.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1900 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to rain showers and flurries near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
